metadata.name: Unfolding Sun
metadata.description:
Kesara x Selyn: The fruits of a collaboration between artist-curator-photographer Kesara, & Selyn Fairtrade culminate in umbrella project of 'The Unfolding Tesseract'. 
It is a visual tapestry - an amalgam of several hours of recorded footage & audio that is to its creator and patrons meditatively experiential with careful reductions of frequencies of the sounds of the loom, the machinery and process that drive the weavers of Selyn. 

'The Unfolding Sun' is the first NFT - and one of the first Sri Lankan craft NFTs - in a collection of micro-concept works each with their own audio recorded at the looms. 

50% of proceeds will be donated towards the welfare of the weaving communities. 

The Kesara X Selyn collaboration marks the start of a corporate digital-space collaboration bringing together the worlds of centuries-old artisanship & the profound possibilities of the blockchain.
